topic.fullpath: Topic :: Formats and Protocols :: Data Formats :: XML

name: wbxml-stream
short_description: The wbxml-stream library is a Java StAX implementation for the WBXML format. StAX - Streaming API for XML is a standard API inside JavaSE for parsing XML documents. WBXML - WAP binary XML is a binary representation of XML used mainly for transmitting XML in a more compact way. In other words the wbxml-stream library lets java parse and encode WBXML documents using StAX.
summary: Java StAX implementation for the WBXML format.
